aka: Les Misérables: The Story of Jean Valjean

cast.name: 格莱高利·嘉德波瓦 Grégory Gadebois
伊莎贝尔·卡雷 Isabelle Carré
亚历山德拉·拉米 Alexandra Lamy

writer.name: 艾瑞克·贝斯纳 Éric Besnard

trans_title: 悲惨世界：冉阿让的故事
Les Misérables: The Story of Jean Valjean
introduction: LoglineThe origin story of one of literature′s greatest heroes.SynopsisThis film adapts the first 100 pages of Les Misérables. This part of the story is usually condensed, even though it lays the foundation for the character of Jean Valjean. In this adaptation, we dive deeply into understanding who Jean Valjean truly is and the journey he undertakes. From a man broken by 20 years of injustice and suffering, further crushed by the rejection he faces upon his release from prison, to the transformed soul we come to know — one who has reclaimed his humanity.
chinese_title: 悲惨世界：冉阿让的故事
